5 #ifndef UI_ANIMATION_HPP_
6 #define UI_ANIMATION_HPP_
7 
8 #include "Drawing.hpp"
9 
10 class AnimationAttr {
11 public:
12  AnimationAttr();
13  enum {
14  PUSH_LEFT = ANIMATION_TYPE_PUSH_LEFT,
15  PUSH_RIGHT = ANIMATION_TYPE_PUSH_RIGHT,
16  PUSH_UP = ANIMATION_TYPE_PUSH_UP,
17  PUSH_DOWN = ANIMATION_TYPE_PUSH_DOWN,
18  SLIDE_LEFT = ANIMATION_TYPE_SLIDE_LEFT,
19  UNDO_SLIDE_LEFT = ANIMATION_TYPE_UNDO_SLIDE_LEFT,
20  SLIDE_UP = ANIMATION_TYPE_SLIDE_UP,
21  UNDO_SLIDE_UP = ANIMATION_TYPE_UNDO_SLIDE_UP,
22  SLIDE_RIGHT = ANIMATION_TYPE_SLIDE_RIGHT,
23  UNDO_SLIDE_RIGHT = ANIMATION_TYPE_UNDO_SLIDE_RIGHT,
24  SLIDE_DOWN = ANIMATION_TYPE_SLIDE_DOWN,
25  UNDO_SLIDE_DOWN = ANIMATION_TYPE_UNDO_SLIDE_DOWN,
26  NONE = ANIMATION_TYPE_NONE,
27  BOUNCE_UP = ANIMATION_TYPE_BOUNCE_UP,
28  BOUNCE_DOWN = ANIMATION_TYPE_BOUNCE_DOWN,
29  BOUNCE_LEFT = ANIMATION_TYPE_BOUNCE_LEFT,
30  BOUNCE_RIGHT = ANIMATION_TYPE_BOUNCE_RIGHT
31  };
32 
33  enum {
34  LINEAR = ANIMATION_PATH_LINEAR,
35  SQUARED = ANIMATION_PATH_SQUARED,
36  SQUARED_UNDO = ANIMATION_PATH_SQUARED_UNDO
37  };
38 
39  mg_animation_t & attr(){ return _attr; }
40  void set_type(u8 v){ _attr.type = v; }
41  void set_path(u8 v){ _attr.path.type = v; }
42  void set_step_total(u8 v){ _attr.path.step_total = v; }
43  void set_motion_total(mg_size_t v){ _attr.path.motion_total = v; }
44 
45  void set_drawing_start(drawing_point_t v){ _drawing_attr.start = v; }
46  void set_drawing_start(drawing_int_t x, drawing_int_t y){ _drawing_attr.start.x = x; _drawing_attr.start.y = y; }
47  void set_drawing_dim(drawing_dim_t v){ _drawing_attr.dim = v; }
48  void set_drawing_dim(drawing_size_t w, drawing_size_t h){ _drawing_attr.dim.w = w; _drawing_attr.dim.h = h; }
49  void set_drawing_motion_total(drawing_size_t v){ _drawing_attr.motion_total = v; }
50 
51 
52  u8 type() const { return _attr.type; }
53  u8 path() const { return _attr.path.type; }
54  u16 step_total() const { return _attr.path.step_total; }
55  mg_point_t start() const { return _attr.start; }
56  mg_dim_t dim() const { return _attr.dim; }
57  mg_size_t motion_total() const { return _attr.path.motion_total; }
58 
59  drawing_point_t drawing_start() const { return _drawing_attr.start; }
60  drawing_dim_t drawing_dim() const { return _drawing_attr.dim; }
61  drawing_size_t drawing_motion_total() const { return _drawing_attr.motion_total; }
62 
63  mg_animation_t * data(){ return &_attr; }
64 
65 private:
66  mg_animation_t _attr;
67  drawing_animation_attr_t _drawing_attr;
68 };
69 
70 class Animation {
71 public:
72  Animation();
73  void init(Drawing * current, Drawing * target);
74  bool exec(void (*draw)(void*,int,int) = 0, void * obj = 0);
75 
76  void update_motion_total(void);
77 
78  bool animate_bar() const { return _animate_bar; }
79  void set_animate_bar(bool v = true){ _animate_bar = v; }
80  AnimationAttr & attr(){ return _attr; }
81  const AnimationAttr & attr_const() const { return _attr; }
82 
83 private:
84  mg_animation_t * pattr(){ return _attr.data(); }
85  AnimationAttr _attr;
86  bool _animate_bar;
87 
88 };

90 #endif /* UI_ANIMATION_HPP_ */
